p: Dialized rZNS1-His (20 μg) was cross-linked with different concentrations of glutaraldehyde (Sigma) for 15 min at 37 °C. Subsequently, the protein samples were mixed with Laemmli buffer, boiled for 5 min, resolved on 7 % SDS-PAGE and analyzed by immunoblot (as described in 2.6. Western blotting).
